languages.text: "Орудие, с помощью которого мятежники сбивали шаттлы в небе над городом, уничтожено, и теперь ничто не помешает вам вернуться на ваш корабль. Если вы желаете отыскать господина ван Калокса — вам стоит направиться в обитель Адептус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "Орудие, с помощью которого мятежники сбивали шаттлы в небе над городом, уничтожено, и теперь ничто не помешает вам вернуться на ваш корабль. Если вы желаете отыскать господина ван Калокса — вам стоит направиться в обитель Адептус Механикус".

languages.text: "The weapon the insurgents were using to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Master van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "Орудие, с помощью которого мятежники сбивали шаттлы в небе над городом, уничтожено, и теперь ничто не помешает вам вернуться на ваш корабль. Если вы желаете отыскать господина ван Калокса — вам стоит направиться в обитель Адептус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "The weapon the insurgents used to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Mr van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

"The weapon the insurgents used to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Mr van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

"The weapon the insurgents used to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Lord van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

"The weapon the insurgents used to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Lord van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

"The weapon the insurgents were using to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Master van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

"The weapon the insurgents were using to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Master van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

languages.text: "Die Waffe, mit der die Aufständischen Shuttles über der Stadt abgeschossen haben, ist zerstört. Es hindert Euch nichts mehr daran, zu Eurem Schiff zurückzukehren. Wenn Ihr Meister van Calox finden möchtet, solltet Ihr zum Cenobium des Adeptus Mechanicus gehen."
languages.original_text: "The weapon the insurgents were using to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Master van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Die Waffe, mit der die Aufständischen Shuttles über der Stadt abgeschossen haben, ist zerstört. Es hindert Euch nichts mehr daran, zu Eurem Schiff zurückzukehren. Wenn Ihr Lord van Calox finden möchtet, solltet Ihr zum Cenobium des Adeptus Mechanicus gehen."

languages.text: « L'arme que les insurgés utilisaient pour abattre les navettes survolant la cité a été détruite. Désormais, plus rien ne vous empêche de regagner votre vaisseau. Si vous voulez voir maître van Calox, vous devriez vous rendre au Cenobium de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »
languages.original_text: "The weapon the insurgents were using to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Master van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: « L'arme que les insurgés utilisaient pour abattre les navettes survolant la cité a été détruite. Désormais, plus rien ne vous empêche de regagner votre vaisseau. Si vous voulez voir maître van Calox, vous devriez vous rendre au Cenobium de l'Adeptus Mechanicus. »

languages.text: “既然叛军用来击落穿梭机的武器已经被摧毁了，您可以自由返回飞船。如果您要找冯·卡洛克斯大师的话，只要去机械修会的修道院就行了。”
languages.original_text: "The weapon the insurgents were using to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Master van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: “既然叛军用来击落穿梭机的武器已被摧毁，您可以自由返回飞船。如果您要找冯·卡洛克斯大人的话，只要去机械修会的修道院就行了。”

languages.text: 「反乱軍が都市上空のシャトルの撃墜に使用していた兵器は破壊された。これで船へ戻る障害は何もない。ヴァン・カロックス殿を探しているなら、帝国技術局の連生体を訪れてはどうだろう」
languages.original_text: "The weapon the insurgents were using to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Master van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: 「反乱軍が都市上空のシャトルの撃墜に使用していた兵器は破壊された。これで船へ戻る障害は何もない。ヴァン・カロックス殿を探しているなら、帝国技術局の連生体を訪れてはどうだろう」

languages.text: «El arma que los insurgentes usaban para derribar las lanzaderas sobre la ciudad ha sido destruida. Ahora nada le impide volver a su nave. Si desea encontrar al maestro van Calox, debe ir al Cenobio del Adeptus Mechanicus».
languages.original_text: "The weapon the insurgents were using to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Master van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: «El arma que los insurgentes utilizaron para derribar las lanzaderas sobre la ciudad ha sido destruida. Ahora nada le impide volver a su nave. Si desea encontrar a lord van Calox, debe ir al cenobio del Adeptus Mechanicus».

languages.text: "Asilerin şehrin üzerinden uçan mekikleri vurup indirmekte kullandığı silah yok edildi. Artık geminize dönmeniz için hiçbir engel yok. Üstat van Calox'u bulma niyetindeyseniz Adeptus Mechanicus'un senobiyumuna gitmelisiniz."
languages.original_text: "The weapon the insurgents were using to shoot down shuttles over the city has been destroyed. Now nothing is preventing you from returning to your ship. If you wish to find Master van Calox, you should go to the cenobium of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Asilerin şehrin üzerinden uçan mekikleri vurup indirmekte kullandığı silah yok edildi. Artık geminize dönmeniz için hiçbir engel yok. Üstat van Calox'u bulma niyetindeyseniz Adeptus Mechanicus'un senobiyumuna gitmelisiniz."
